metadata.title: CVE-2014-2686 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Ansible prior to 1.5.4 mishandles the evaluation of some strings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2686` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.5.4+dfsg-1
ansible-fireball - 1.5.4+dfsg-1
ansible-node-fireball - 1.5.4+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ansible package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.4+dfsg-1').
